body_html: By default when using a tf.train.Supervisor, summaries are only written by the chief worker. To write summaries from a non-chief worker, you must pass a tf.summary.FileWriter object when creating the supervisor: sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_writer=tf.summary.FileWriter(path)).
body_text: By default when using a tf.train.Supervisor, summaries are only written by the chief worker. To write summaries from a non-chief worker, you must  pass a tf.summary.FileWriter object when creating the supervisor: sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_writer=tf.summary.FileWriter(path)).
body: By default when using a `tf.train.Supervisor`, summaries are only written by the chief worker. To write summaries from a non-chief worker, you must  pass a `tf.summary.FileWriter` object when creating the supervisor: `sv = tf.train.Supervisor(..., summary_writer=tf.summary.FileWriter(path))`.
